QuestData.Title: Nothing a Couple of Melons Won't Fix
QuestData.Description: The markings on the ruins here make one thing clear: There is something special about the old fountain in the Sanctuary of Elune.$b$bIt would seem that one could expect special power from washing their face in the fountain. First, of course, there would need to be something in the ancient fountain with which to wash.$b$bPondering this problem, you spot a melonfruit at the base of a nearby tree....
QuestData.RewardText: After filling it with liquid from the melons, you proceed to wash your eyes from the ancient font.$b$bUpon opening your eyes, you are able to see the spirits of ancient elves, still faithfully carrying out rituals to their goddess.
